title: Tamil Nadu Budget 2026-27 LIVE updates: FM Thennarasu to present interim Budget ahead of polls
content:
Tamil Nadu's 2026-27 Budget is being presented.
*   Finance Minister Thennarasu will present an interim budget.
*   The presentation comes ahead of upcoming polls.

title: After HC order, Odisha government declares to catalogue jewelleries of Shree Jagannath Temple soon
content:
The Odisha government has announced its plan to catalogue the jewellery of Shree Jagannath Temple.
*   This decision comes in direct response to an order issued by the High Court.
*   The inventorying process for the temple's ornaments is expected to begin shortly.

title: M.P. Assembly’s Budget Session begins with uproar over Indore deaths during Governor’s address
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The M.P. Assembly's Budget Session has commenced.
*   The session began with significant uproar during the Governor's address.
*   The protests were specifically in response to recent deaths in Indore.

title: Karur police book BJP district president for making derogatory remarks against Congress MP Jothimani
content:
Karur police have registered a case against the BJP district president.
*   The action was taken due to him making derogatory remarks.
*   The remarks were directed against Congress MP Jothimani.

title: FEMA adjudicating authority imposes ₹184 crore penalty on NewsClick, founder Prabir Purkayastha
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   The FEMA (Foreign Exchange Management Act) adjudicating authority has imposed a penalty on NewsClick and its founder, Prabir Purkayastha.
*   The total penalty levied amounts to ₹184 crore.
*   This action by the FEMA authority indicates alleged violations related to foreign exchange management.

title: Municipal chiefs’ elections expose Congress-BJP power pact: Harish Rao
content:
Harish Rao alleges a "power pact" exists between the Congress and BJP parties.
*   This alleged pact was exposed during the recent municipal chiefs' elections.
*   The claim suggests a strategic, underlying alliance between the two traditionally rival political parties.

title: Telangana eyes inclusion among five regional medical tourism hubs announced in Union Budget
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   The Union Budget announced the establishment of five regional medical tourism hubs.
*   Telangana is actively seeking inclusion as one of these five hubs.
*   These hubs aim to promote and develop medical tourism within their respective regions.

title: Koneru Humpy and P.V. Sindhu launch SAAP League for young athletes
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Renowned athletes Koneru Humpy and P.V. Sindhu have launched a new league.
*   The initiative is named the SAAP League.
*   Its primary focus is to support and engage young athletes.

title: Pongala: elaborate arrangements by railways for devotees
content:
Railways are making elaborate arrangements.
*   These arrangements are specifically for devotees.
*   The preparations are in anticipation of the Pongala festival.

title: Watch: AI Summit 2026: PM Modi inaugurates India AI Impact Expo
content:
PM Modi inaugurated the India AI Impact Expo.
*   The expo is linked to the upcoming AI Summit 2026.
*   These events highlight India's focus on Artificial Intelligence.
